themes: critical need for continued arts funding
preservation of existing arts organizations and infrastructure
arts as essential to Austin's identity and community well-being
public responsibility for supporting the arts
urgency due to a pivotal moment for the arts community
key_phrases: stress how important I believe it is that the arts (of all types) continue to be funded in Austin
especially our existing organizations and infrastructure
we are at a critical juncture, and now is the time to double down
preserve the creative soul of our community
arts enrich so many peoples lives
I would hate to see our art scene die or disappear
public responsibility to ensure that the arts survive and thrive
barriers_identified: potential loss of funding and resources for the arts
solutions_proposed: double down on funding for the arts
ensure continued access to funding and resources
